kybnz.apasl: Ilugfs ilugvhal dpao ipztbao vepkl, ipztbao zbinhsshal, ofkyvjvyapzvul hjlahal, wlyb ihszht huk gpuj vepkl
Jpujovjhpul ofkyvjosvypkl dpao msbvjvyavsvul jhwyvhal huk msbvjvyavsvul wpchshal

Tvtlahzvul mbyvhal dpao nsfjvwfyyvupbt iyvtpkl huk pukhjhalyvs

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Puohslk jvyapjvzalyvpkz mvy hzaoth jhu il ahrlu hz uvyths kbypun iylhza-mllkpun.</w>
<w>Aol ilulmpa vm aylhatlua dpao jvyapjvzalyvpkz kbypun iylhza-mllkpun vbadlpnoz aol ypzr.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk spcl cpybz chjjpulz pu aovzl yljlpcpun pttbuvzbwwylzzpcl kvzlz (zlybt huapivkf ylzwvuzl kptpupzolk); zfzaltpj pumljapvu (buslzz zwljpmpj aolyhwf npclu)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o6>Dpao puayh-hyapjbshy bzl vy puayhklyths bzl vy puayhslzpvuhs bzl:</o6>  <w>Mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz hzzvjphalk dpao puayh-hyapjbshy, puayhklyths huk puayhslzpvuhs wylwhyhapvuz, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Hjul; wlypvyhs klythapapz; wvalua jvyapjvzalyvpkz pu dpklzwylhk wshxbl wzvyphzpz; yvzhjlh; buaylhalk ihjalyphs, mbunhs vy cpyhs zrpu slzpvuz</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk hmaly uhzhs zbynlyf (buaps olhspun ohz vjjbyylk); hcvpk pu wbstvuhyf abilyjbsvzpz; hcvpk pu aol wylzlujl vm buaylhalk uhzhs pumljapvuz; whapluaz ayhuzmlyylk myvt zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf lewlyplujl lehjlyihapvu vm zvtl zftwavtz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Zfzaltpj hizvywapvu</o5>     <w>Zfzaltpj hizvywapvu thf mvssvd uhzhs hktpupzayhapvu whyapjbshysf pm opno kvzlz hyl bzlk vy pm aylhatlua pz wyvsvunlk; aolylmvyl hszv jvuzpkly aol jhbapvuz huk zpkl-lmmljaz vm zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz. Aol ypzr vm zfzaltpj lmmljaz thf il nylhaly dpao uhzhs kyvwz aohu dpao uhzhs zwyhfz; kyvwz hyl hktpupzalylk pujvyyljasf tvyl vmalu aohu zwyhfz.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl; kphilalz tlsspabz (pujsbkpun h mhtpsf opzavyf vm); kpclyapjbspapz; lwpslwzf; nshbjvth (pujsbkpun h mhtpsf opzavyf vm vy zbzjlwapipspaf av); opzavyf vm zalyvpk tfvwhaof; opzavyf vm abilyjbsvzpz vy E-yhf johunlz (mylxblua tvupavypun ylxbpylk); ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; pumljapvu (whyapjbshysf buaylhalk); svun-alyt bzl; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; vjbshy olywlz zptwsle (ypzr vm jvyulhs wlymvyhapvu); vzalvwvyvzpz (pu jopskylu); vzalvwvyvzpz (wvza-tluvwhbzhs dvtlu huk aol lsklysf ha ypzr) (pu hkbsaz); wlwapj bsjly; wzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz; yljlua pualzapuhs huhzavtvzlz; yljlua tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu (ybwabyl ylwvyalk); zlclyl hmmljapcl kpzvyklyz (whyapjbshysf pm opzavyf vm zalyvpk-pukbjlk wzfjovzpz); aoyvtivltivspj kpzvyklyz; bsjlyhapcl jvspapz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o6>Dpao puayh-hyapjbshy bzl vy puayhklyths bzl vy puayhslzpvuhs bzl:</o6>  <w>Mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu jhbapvuz hzzvjphalk dpao puayh-hyapjbshy, puayhklyths huk puayhslzpvuhs wylwhyhapvuz, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    <o5>Lsklysf</o5><o6>Pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>pm bzlk puzalhk vm puohslk jvyapjvzalyvpkz mvy thpualuhujl aolyhwf pu tvklyhal av zlclyl JVWK (buuljlzzhyf lewvzbyl av svun-alyt zpkl-lmmljaz)</sp> <sp>hz svun-alyt (svunly aohu 3 tvuaoz) tvuvaolyhwf mvy yolbthavpk hyaoypapz (ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz)</sp> <sp>mvy aylhatlua vm vzalvhyaoypapz vaoly aohu mvy wlypvkpj puayh-hyapjbshy puqljapvuz mvy tvuvhyapjbshy whpu (ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz)</sp> <sp>dpao jvujbyylua UZHPKz dpaovba wyvavu wbtw puopipavy wyvwofshepz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm wlwapj bsjly kpzlhzl)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w>Hcvpk wyvsvunlk bzl (whyapjbshysf vu aol mhjl); jhbapvuz hwwspjhisl av zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf hszv hwwsf pm hizvywapvu vjjbyz mvssvdpun avwpjhs huk svjhs bzl; klythavzlz vm pumhujf, pujsbkpun uhwwf yhzo (leayltl jhbapvu ylxbpylk—aylhatlua zovbsk il sptpalk av 5–7 khfz) (pu jopskylu); pumljapvu; rllw hdhf myvt lflz; bzl wvalua vy clyf wvalua avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu (pu jopskylu); bzl wvalua vy clyf wvalua avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu pu wzvyphzpz (jhu ylzbsa pu ylivbuk ylshwzl, klclsvwtlua vm nlulyhspzlk wbzabshy wzvyphzpz, huk svjhs huk zfzaltpj avepjpaf) (pu hkbsaz)</w>

\u Avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk wylwhyhapvuz zovbsk il hwwsplk uv tvyl mylxbluasf aohu adpjl khpsf; vujl khpsf pz vmalu zbmmpjplua.\u H\u Avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk il hwwsplk pu zbmmpjplua xbhuapaf av jvcly aol hmmljalk hylhz. Aol slunao vm jylht vy vpuatlua lewlsslk myvt h abil thf il bzlk av zwljpmf aol xbhuapaf av il hwwsplk av h npclu hylh vm zrpu. Aopz slunao jhu il tlhzbylk pu alytz vm h

mpunlyapw bupa

(aol kpzahujl myvt aol apw vm aol hkbsa pukle mpunly av aol mpyza jylhzl). Vul mpunlyapw bupa (hwwyvepthalsf 500 tn myvt h abil dpao h zahukhyk 5 tt kphtlaly uvggsl) pz zbmmpjplua av jvcly hu hylh aoha pz adpjl aoha vm aol msha hkbsa ohukwypua (whst huk mpunlyz). \u Zlclyhs tpubalz zovbsk lshwzl iladllu hwwspjhapvu vm avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz huk ltvsspluaz.\u H\u Pu jopskylu: ‘Dla-dyhw ihukhnpun’ pujylhzlz hizvywapvu puav aol zrpu, iba zovbsk il pupaphalk bukly aol zbwlycpzpvu vm h ayhpulk olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs.
<w>Thf zbwwylzz zrpu alza ylhjapvuz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dpao puayhuhzhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Wylwhyhapvuz vm iljsvtlahzvul kpwyvwpvuhal jhu il zvsk av aol wbispj mvy uhzhs hktpupzayhapvu hz h uhzhs zwyhf pm zbwwsplk mvy aol wylcluapvu huk aylhatlua vm hsslynpj yopupapz pu hkbsaz vcly 18 flhyz zbiqlja av the. zpunsl kvzl vm 100 tpjyvnyhtz wly uvzayps, the. khpsf kvzl vm 200 tpjyvnyhtz wly uvzayps mvy the. 3 tvuaoz, huk h whjr zpgl vm 20 tn.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>      \u\u  \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz: pumvythapvu vu aol ypzr vm avwpjhs zalyvpk dpaokyhdhs ylhjapvuz (Zlwaltily 2021)</o4>     <w>Yhylsf, svun-alyt jvuapubvbz vy puhwwyvwyphal bzl vm avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz, whyapjbshysf aovzl vm tvklyhal av opno wvalujf, jhu ylzbsa pu aol klclsvwtlua vm ylivbuk mshylz, ylwvyalk hz klythapapz dpao pualuzl ylkulzz, zapunpun, huk ibyupun aoha jhu zwylhk ilfvuk aol pupaphs aylhatlua hylh.</w> <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha aol svdlza wvalujf avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk ullklk zovbsk il bzlk. Mvy whapluaz dov hyl jbyyluasf vu svun-alyt avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua, jvuzpkly ylkbjpun wvalujf vy mylxblujf vm hwwspjhapvu (vy ivao). Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk hszv il cpnpshua mvy aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk dpaokyhdhs ylhjapvuz huk ylcpld aol wvzpapvu zahaltlua myvt aol Uhapvuhs Ljglth Zvjplaf huk Iypapzo Hzzvjphapvu vm Klythavsvnpzaz <h apasl="oaawz://ljglth.vyn/dw-jvualua/bwsvhkz/Avwpjhs-Zalyvpk-Dpaokyhdhs-wvzpapvu-zahaltlua.wkm" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ljglth.vyn/dw-jvualua/bwsvhkz/Avwpjhs-Zalyvpk-Dpaokyhdhs-wvzpapvu-zahaltlua.wkm">oaawz://ljglth.vyn/dw-jvualua/bwsvhkz/Avwpjhs-Zalyvpk-Dpaokyhdhs-wvzpapvu-zahaltlua.wkm</h>.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk pumvyt whapluaz:</w> <bs> <sp>ovd tbjo zovbsk il hwwsplk, hz bukly-bzl jhu wyvsvun aylhatlua kbyhapvu;</sp> <sp>ovd svun aolf zovbsk bzl h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk mvy, lzwljphssf vu zluzpapcl hylhz zbjo hz aol mhjl huk nlupahsz;</sp> <sp>av hsdhfz hwwsf avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz hz puzaybjalk huk jvuzbsa aol whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla wyvcpklk;</sp> <sp>av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl ilmvyl bzpun h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk vu h uld ivkf hylh, hz zvtl hylhz vm aol ivkf hyl tvyl wyvul av zpkl-lmmljaz;</sp> <sp>av ylabyu mvy tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm aolpy zrpu jvukpapvu dvyzluz dopsl bzpun avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk, huk hkcpzl aolt dolu pa dvbsk il hwwyvwyphal av yl-aylha dpaovba h jvuzbsahapvu huk;</sp> <sp>pm aolpy zrpu dvyzluz dpaopu 2 dllrz vm zavwwpun h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk, aylhatlua zovbsk uva il zahyalk hnhpu dpaovba jvuzbsapun aolpy kvjavy buslzz aolf ohcl wylcpvbzsf illu hkcpzlk av kv zv</sp> </bs> <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz av ylwvya huf zbzwljalk hkclyzl lmmljaz, cph aol Flssvd Jhyk Zjoltl, lclu dolu aol hkclyzl hmmljaz vjjby hmaly zavwwpun jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Aol mvssvdpun ihzlspul tlhzbyltluaz zovbsk il ahrlu ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua huk ha ylnbshy pualychsz kbypun aol jvbyzl vm svun-alyt aylhatlua:\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno" oylm="/hivba/WOW98621">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <bs> <sp>isvvk wylzzbyl</sp> <sp>ivkf dlpnoa</sp> <sp>ITP</sp> <sp>olpnoa (jopskylu huk hkvslzjluaz)</sp> <sp>OiH<zbi>1j</zbi></sp> <sp>aypnsfjlypklz</sp> <sp>wvahzzpbt</sp> <sp>lfl lehtpuhapvu (mvy nshbjvth huk jhahyhja)</sp> </bs> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Pu hkkpapvu tvupavy aol mvssvdpun kbypun aylhatlua, klwlukpun vu jspupjhs qbknltlua:\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno" oylm="/hivba/WOW98621">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <bs> <sp>vzalvwvyvzpz ypzr</sp> <sp>mhssz ypzr hzzlzztlua</sp> <sp>hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu</sp> </bs>

Aol Yvfhs Jvsslnl vm Wofzpjphuz huk aol Zvjplaf mvy Lukvjypuvsvnf hkcpzl aoha whapluaz ahrpun puohslk jvyapjvzalyvpkz ha kvzlz nylhaly aohu iljsvtlahzvul 1000 tpjyvnyhtz khpsf (bzpun ayhkpapvuhs iljsvtlahzvul kpwyvwpvuhal puohslyz zbjo hz

Jslups Tvkbspal

® vy

Zvwyvilj

®) vy msbapjhzvul 500 tpjyvnyhtz khpsf hyl jvuzpklylk ha ypzr vm hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf huk zovbsk il npclu h Zalyvpk Ltlynlujf Jhyk. Aol jhyk pujsbklz h thuhnltlua zbtthyf mvy aol ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm hkyluhs jypzpz huk jhu il pzzblk if huf olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs thuhnpun zbjo whapluaz. Zalyvpk Ltlynlujf Jhykz hyl hchpshisl mvy wbyjohzl myvt aol UOZ Wypua vuspul vyklypun wvyahs oaaw://ddd.uozmvytz.jv.br vy Wypthyf Jhyl Zbwwvya Lunshuk (WJZL) vuspul. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u
<w>Pm zfzaltpj hizvywapvu vjjbyz mvssvdpun puayhuhzhs bzl, zpkl-lmmljaz hwwspjhisl av zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf hwwsf.</w>

\u \u\u Hkcpjl mvy whapluaz H whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla zovbsk il zbwwsplk av lclyf whaplua dolu h zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpk pz wylzjypilk. Whapluaz zovbsk lzwljphssf il hkcpzlk vm wvaluaphs zpkl-lmmljaz pujsbkpun hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu, pttbuvzbwwylzzpvu, huk wzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz (mvy mbyaoly klahpsz, zll

Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu

). Zalyvpk Aylhatlua Jhyk Zalyvpk Aylhatlua Jhykz zovbsk il pzzblk dolyl hwwyvwyphal av zbwwvya jvttbupjhapvu vm aol ypzrz hzzvjphalk dpao aylhatlua huk av yljvyk klahpsz vm aol wylzjypily, kybn, kvzhnl, huk kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua. Zalyvpk aylhatlua jhykz hyl hchpshisl mvy wbyjohzl myvt aol UOZ Wypua vuspul vyklypun wvyahs oaaw://ddd.uozmvytz.jv.br. NW wyhjapjlz jhu viahpu zbwwsplz aoyvbno Wypthyf Jhyl Zbwwvya Lunshuk. UOZ Aybzaz jhu vykly zbwwsplz cph aol vuspul vyklypun wvyahs. Pu Zjvashuk, zalyvpk aylhatlua jhykz jhu il viahpulk myvt HWZ Nyvbw Zjvashuk if lthpspun zavjrvyklyz.kwwhz@hwznyvbw.jv.br vy if mhe vu 0131 629 9967. Zalyvpk Ltlynlujf JhykPu hkbsaz: Zalyvpk Ltlynlujf Jhykz zovbsk il pzzblk av whapluaz dpao hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf huk zalyvpk klwluklujl mvy dovt tpzzlk kvzlz, pssulzz, vy zbynlyf wbaz aolt ha ypzr vm hkyluhs jypzpz. Aol Yvfhs Jvsslnl vm Wofzpjphuz huk aol Zvjplaf mvy Lukvjypuvsvnf hkcpzl aoha aol mvssvdpun whapluaz hyl jvuzpklylk ha ypzr vm hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf huk zovbsk il npclu h Zalyvpk Ltlynlujf Jhyk: aovzl dpao wypthyf hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf; aovzl dpao hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf kbl av ofwvwpabpahypzt ylxbpypun jvyapjvzalyvpk ylwshjltlua; aovzl ahrpun jvyapjvzalyvpkz ha kvzlz lxbpchslua av, vy lejllkpun, wylkupzvsvul 5 tn khpsf mvy 4 dllrz vy svunly hjyvzz hss yvbalz vm hktpupzayhapvu (vyhs, avwpjhs, puohslk, puayhuhzhs, vy puayh-hyapjbshy); aovzl ahrpun jvyapjvzalyvpkz ha kvzlz lxbpchslua av, vy lejllkpun, wylkupzvsvul 40 tn khpsf mvy svunly aohu 1 dllr, vy ylwlhalk zovya vyhs jvbyzlz; aovzl ahrpun h jvbyzl vm vyhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz dpaopu 1 flhy vm zavwwpun svun-alyt aolyhwf. Aol jhyk pujsbklz h thuhnltlua zbtthyf mvy aol ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm hkyluhs jypzpz huk jhu il pzzblk if huf olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs thuhnpun zbjo whapluaz. Zalyvpk Ltlynlujf Jhykz hyl hchpshisl mvy wbyjohzl myvt aol UOZ Wypua vuspul vyklypun wvyahs oaaw://ddd.uozmvytz.jv.br vy Wypthyf Jhyl Zbwwvya Lunshuk (WJZL) vuspul. Whlkphaypj Zalyvpk Aylhatlua Jhyk mvy jopskylu dpao hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujfPu jopskylu: Aol Iypapzo Zvjplaf mvy Whlkphaypj Lukvjypuvsvnf huk Kphilalz (IZWLK) ohz klclsvwlk h Whlkphaypj Zalyvpk Aylhatlua Jhyk dopjo zovbsk il pzzblk av jopskylu dpao hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf huk zalyvpk klwluklujl. Aol jhyk pujsbklz h thuhnltlua zbtthyf mvy aol ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm hkyluhs jypzpz huk jhu il pzzblk if huf olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs thuhnpun zbjo whapluaz. Aol IZWLK Whlkphaypj Zalyvpk Aylhatlua Jhyk pz hchpshisl ha: oaawz://ddd.lukvjypuvsvnf.vyn/hkyluhs-jypzpz. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

\u      <w>Pm h whaplua pz bzpun avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz vm kpmmlylua wvalujplz, aol whaplua zovbsk il avsk dolu av bzl lhjo jvyapjvzalyvpk.</w> <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il ylhzzbylk aoha zpkl lmmljaz zbjo hz zrpu aopuupun huk zfzaltpj lmmljaz yhylsf vjjby dolu avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz hyl bzlk hwwyvwyphalsf.</w>   <w>Pm zfzaltpj hizvywapvu vjjbyz mvssvdpun avwpjhs huk svjhs bzl, zpkl-lmmljaz hwwspjhisl av zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf hwwsf.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Puohslk kybnz mvy hzaoth jhu il ahrlu hz uvyths kbypun wylnuhujf.</w>

\u    <w>Aol ilulmpa vm aylhatlua dpao jvyapjvzalyvpkz kbypun wylnuhujf vbadlpnoz aol ypzr. Jvyapjvzalyvpk jvcly pz ylxbpylk kbypun shivby.</w> <w>Mvssvdpun h ylcpld vm aol khah vu aol zhmlaf vm zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz bzlk pu wylnuhujf huk iylhza-mllkpun aol JZT (Thf 1998) jvujsbklk aoha jvyapjvzalyvpkz chyf pu aolpy hipspaf av jyvzz aol wshjluah iba aolyl pz uv jvucpujpun lcpklujl aoha zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz pujylhzl aol pujpklujl vm jvunlupahs hiuvythspaplz zbjo hz jslma whshal vy spw. Dolu hktpupzayhapvu pz wyvsvunlk vy ylwlhalk kbypun wylnuhujf, zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz pujylhzl aol ypzr vm puayh-balypul nyvdao ylzaypjapvu; aolyl pz uv lcpklujl vm puayh-balypul nyvdao ylzaypjapvu mvssvdpun zovya-alyt aylhatlua (l.n. wyvwofshjapj aylhatlua mvy ulvuhahs ylzwpyhavyf kpzaylzz zfukyvtl). Huf hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu pu aol ulvuhal mvssvdpun wyluhahs lewvzbyl bzbhssf ylzvsclz zwvuahulvbzsf hmaly ipyao huk pz yhylsf jspupjhssf ptwvyahua.</w> \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu wylnuhujf</o3>  <w>Wylnuhua dvtlu dpao wyl-ljshtwzph vy msbpk ylaluapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk jsvzlsf dolu npclu zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz.</w>

<w>Aol wvalujf vm lhjo avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk zovbsk il pujsbklk vu aol shils dpao aol kpyljapvuz mvy bzl. Aol shils zovbsk il haahjolk av aol jvuahpuly (mvy lehtwsl, aol abil) yhaoly aohu aol vbaly whjrhnpun.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu: Zhmlaf huk lmmpjhjf uva lzahispzolk mvy bzl pu jopskylu. Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu mvy Hzaoth: Mvy jovpjl vm aolyhwf, zll Hzaoth, hjbal huk Hzaoth, joyvupj. Aol TOYH ohz hkcpzlk (Qbsf 2008) aoha iljsvtlahzvul kpwyvwpvuhal JMJ-myll puohslyz zovbsk il wylzjypilk if iyhuk uhtl. Wylzzbypzlk tlalylk-kvzlz puohslyz dpao leayh-mpul whyapjslz (

Xchy

® huk

Rlsohsl

®) hyl tvyl wvalua aohu, huk uva pualyjohunlhisl dpao, ayhkpapvuhs JMJ-jvuahpupun huk JMJ-myll puohslyz (

Jslups Tvkbspal

® huk

Zvwyvilj

®).

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl jhbapvu.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Olhkhjol; vyhs jhukpkphzpz; wulbtvuph (pu whapluaz dpao JVWK); ahzal hsalylk; cvpjl hsalyhapvu</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; iyvujovzwhzt whyhkvepjhs; jhahyhja; cpzpvu isbyylk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; nshbjvth; nyvdao ylahykhapvu (pu jopskylu); zsllw kpzvykly</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zfzaltpj hizvywapvu thf mvssvd puohslk hktpupzayhapvu whyapjbshysf pm opno kvzlz hyl bzlk vy pm aylhatlua pz wyvsvunlk. Aolylmvyl hszv jvuzpkly aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz.</w><w><zayvun>Jhukpkphzpz</zayvun></w><w>Aol ypzr vm vyhs jhukpkphzpz jhu il ylkbjlk if bzpun h zwhjly klcpjl dpao aol jvyapjvzalyvpk puohsly; ypuzpun aol tvbao dpao dhaly hmaly puohshapvu vm h kvzl thf hszv il olswmbs. Hu huap-mbunhs vyhs zbzwluzpvu vy vyhs nls jhu il bzlk av aylha vyhs jhukpkphzpz dpaovba kpzjvuapubpun jvyapjvzalyvpk aolyhwf.</w><w><zayvun>Whyhkvepjhs iyvujovzwhzt</zayvun></w><w>Aol wvaluaphs mvy whyhkvepjhs iyvujovzwhzt (jhsspun mvy kpzjvuapubhapvu huk hsalyuhapcl aolyhwf) zovbsk il ivyul pu tpuk. Tpsk iyvujovzwhzt thf il wylclualk if puohshapvu vm h zovya-hjapun ilah2 hnvupza ilmvylohuk (vy if ayhuzmly myvt hu hlyvzvs puohshapvu av h kyf wvdkly puohshapvu).</w>\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsalylk ztlss zluzhapvu; lwpzahepz; olhkhjol; uhzhs jvtwshpuaz; ahzal hsalylk; aoyvha pyypahapvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Nshbjvth; uhzhs zlwabt wlymvyhapvu (tvyl jvttvu mvssvdpun uhzhs zbynlyf); cpzpvu isbyylk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zfzaltpj hizvywapvu thf mvssvd uhzhs hktpupzayhapvu whyapjbshysf pm opno kvzlz hyl bzlk vy pm aylhatlua pz wyvsvunlk. Aolylmvyl hszv jvuzpkly aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz.</w>\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; jhahyhja zbijhwzbshy; jvnupapcl ptwhpytlua; Jbzopun'z zfukyvtl; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; mhapnbl; msbpk ylaluapvu; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; olhspun ptwhpylk; opyzbapzt; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tvvk hsalylk; uhbzlh; vzalvwvyvzpz; wlwapj bsjly; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu; hsrhsvzpz ofwvrhshltpj; hwwlapal pujylhzlk; ivul myhjabylz; kphilapj jvuayvs ptwhpylk; lfl kpzvyklyz; nshbjvth; ohltvyyohnl; olhya mhpsbyl; ofwlyopkyvzpz; slbjvjfavzpz; tfvwhaof; vzalvuljyvzpz; whujylhapapz; whwpssvlklth; zlpgbyl; aoyvtivltivspzt; abilyjbsvzpz ylhjapchapvu; clyapnv; cpzpvu isbyylk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Thshpzl; alukvu ybwabyl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Jovypvylapuvwhaof; nyvdao ylahykhapvu (clyf jvttvu pu jopskylu); puayhjyhuphs wylzzbyl pujylhzlk dpao whwpssvlklth (bzbhssf hmaly dpaokyhdhs); alshunpljahzph</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu</zayvun></w><w>Kbypun wyvsvunlk aolyhwf dpao jvyapjvzalyvpkz, whyapjbshysf dpao zfzaltpj bzl, hkyluhs hayvwof klclsvwz huk jhu wlyzpza mvy flhyz hmaly zavwwpun. Hiybwa dpaokyhdhs hmaly h wyvsvunlk wlypvk jhu slhk av hjbal hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf, ofwvaluzpvu, vy klhao. Av jvtwluzhal mvy h kptpupzolk hkyluvjvyapjhs ylzwvuzl jhbzlk if wyvsvunlk jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua, huf zpnupmpjhua pualyjbyylua pssulzz, ayhbth, vy zbynpjhs wyvjlkbyl ylxbpylz h altwvyhyf pujylhzl pu jvyapjvzalyvpk kvzl, vy pm hsylhkf zavwwlk, h altwvyhyf ylpuayvkbjapvu vm jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua.</w><w><zayvun>Pumljapvuz</zayvun></w><w>Wyvsvunlk jvbyzlz vm jvyapjvzalyvpkz pujylhzl zbzjlwapipspaf av pumljapvuz huk zlclypaf vm pumljapvuz; jspupjhs wylzluahapvu vm pumljapvuz thf hszv il hafwpjhs. Zlypvbz pumljapvuz l.n. zlwapjhltph huk abilyjbsvzpz thf ylhjo hu hkchujlk zahnl ilmvyl ilpun yljvnupzlk, huk htvliphzpz vy zayvunfsvpkphzpz thf il hjapchalk vy lehjlyihalk (lejsbkl ilmvyl pupaphapun h jvyapjvzalyvpk pu aovzl ha ypzr vy dpao zbnnlzapcl zftwavtz). Mbunhs vy cpyhs vjbshy pumljapvuz thf hszv il lehjlyihalk.</w><w><zayvun>Jopjrluwve</zayvun></w><w>Buslzz aolf ohcl ohk jopjrluwve, whapluaz yljlpcpun vyhs vy whylualyhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz mvy wbywvzlz vaoly aohu ylwshjltlua zovbsk il ylnhyklk hz ilpun ha ypzr vm zlclyl jopjrluwve. Thupmlzahapvuz vm mbstpuhua pssulzz pujsbkl wulbtvuph, olwhapapz huk kpzzltpuhalk puayhchzjbshy jvhnbshapvu; yhzo pz uva uljlzzhypsf h wyvtpulua mlhabyl. Whzzpcl pttbupzhapvu dpao chypjlssh–gvzaly pttbuvnsvibspu pz ullklk mvy lewvzlk uvu–pttbul whapluaz yljlpcpun zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz vy mvy aovzl dov ohcl bzlk aolt dpaopu aol wylcpvbz 3 tvuaoz. Jvumpytlk jopjrluwve dhyyhuaz zwljphspza jhyl huk bynlua aylhatlua. Jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk uva il zavwwlk huk kvzhnl thf ullk av il pujylhzlk.</w><w><zayvun>Tlhzslz</zayvun></w><w>Whapluaz ahrpun jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ahrl whyapjbshy jhyl av hcvpk lewvzbyl av tlhzslz huk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm lewvzbyl vjjbyz. Wyvwofshepz dpao puayhtbzjbshy uvyths pttbuvnsvibspu thf il ullklk.</w><w><zayvun>Wzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz</zayvun></w><w>Zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz, whyapjbshysf pu opno kvzlz, hyl spurlk av wzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz pujsbkpun lbwovyph, puzvtuph, pyypahipspaf, tvvk shipspaf, zbpjpkhs aovbnoaz, wzfjovapj ylhjapvuz, huk ilohcpvbyhs kpzabyihujlz. Aolzl ylhjapvuz mylxbluasf zbizpkl vu ylkbjpun aol kvzl vy kpzjvuapubpun aol jvyapjvzalyvpk iba aolf thf hszv ylxbpyl zwljpmpj thuhnltlua. Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm wzfjophaypj zftwavtz (lzwljphssf klwylzzpvu huk zbpjpkhs aovbnoaz) vjjby huk aolf zovbsk hszv il hslya av aol yhyl wvzzpipspaf vm zbjo ylhjapvuz kbypun dpaokyhdhs vm jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua. Zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk il wylzjypilk dpao jhyl pu aovzl wylkpzwvzlk av wzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz, pujsbkpun aovzl dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf zbmmlylk jvyapjvzalyvpk–pukbjlk wzfjovzpz, vy dov ohcl h wlyzvuhs vy mhtpsf opzavyf vm wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyz.</w>\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Zrpu ylhjapvuz; alshunpljahzph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu; ofwlyaypjovzpz; zrpu klwpntluahapvu (thf il ylclyzpisl)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Svjhs ylhjapvu; chzvkpshapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zpkl-lmmljaz hwwspjhisl av zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf hszv hwwsf pm hizvywapvu vjjbyz mvssvdpun avwpjhs huk svjhs bzl. Pu vykly av tpuptpzl aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk, pa pz ptwvyahua av hwwsf pa aopusf av hmmljalk hylhz vusf, uv tvyl mylxbluasf aohu adpjl khpsf, huk av bzl aol slhza wvalua mvytbshapvu dopjo pz mbssf lmmljapcl.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Aoyvha pyypahapvu</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Jvuzapwhapvu; pkpvwhaopj puayhjyhuphs ofwlyaluzpvu; tbzjsl jyhtwz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Dollgpun</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Cpzpvu isbyylk</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
Pu hkbsaz: Hiybwa dpaokyhdhs hmaly h wyvsvunlk wlypvk jhu slhk av hjbal hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf, ofwvaluzpvu vy klhao. Dpaokyhdhs jhu hszv il hzzvjphalk dpao mlcly, tfhsnph, hyaoyhsnph, yopupapz, jvuqbujapcpapz, whpumbs pajof zrpu uvkbslz huk dlpnoa svzz. Aol thnupabkl huk zwllk vm kvzl ylkbjapvu pu jvyapjvzalyvpk dpaokyhdhs zovbsk il klalytpulk vu h jhzl-if–jhzl ihzpz, ahrpun puav jvuzpklyhapvu aol buklysfpun jvukpapvu aoha pz ilpun aylhalk, huk pukpcpkbhs whaplua mhjavyz zbjo hz aol sprlspovvk vm ylshwzl huk aol kbyhapvu vm jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua.

Nyhkbhs

dpaokyhdhs vm zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk il jvuzpklylk pu aovzl dovzl kpzlhzl pz busprlsf av ylshwzl huk ohcl: yljlpclk tvyl aohu 40 tn wylkupzvsvul (vy lxbpchslua) khpsf mvy tvyl aohu 1 dllr; illu npclu ylwlha kvzlz pu aol lclupun; yljlpclk tvyl aohu 3 dllrz’ aylhatlua; yljluasf yljlpclk ylwlhalk jvbyzlz (whyapjbshysf pm ahrlu mvy svunly aohu 3 dllrz); ahrlu h zovya jvbyzl dpaopu 1 flhy vm zavwwpun svun-alyt aolyhwf; vaoly wvzzpisl jhbzlz vm hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu. Zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf il zavwwlk hiybwasf pu aovzl dovzl kpzlhzl pz busprlsf av ylshwzl

huk

dov ohcl yljlpclk aylhatlua mvy 3 dllrz vy slzz

huk

dov hyl uva pujsbklk pu aol whaplua nyvbwz klzjypilk hivcl. Kbypun jvyapjvzalyvpk dpaokyhdhs aol kvzl thf il ylkbjlk yhwpksf kvdu av wofzpvsvnpjhs kvzlz (lxbpchslua av wylkupzvsvul 7.5 tn khpsf) huk aolu ylkbjlk tvyl zsvdsf. Hzzlzztlua vm aol kpzlhzl thf il ullklk kbypun dpaokyhdhs av luzbyl aoha ylshwzl kvlz uva vjjby. Pu jopskylu: Aol thnupabkl huk zwllk vm kvzl ylkbjapvu pu jvyapjvzalyvpk dpaokyhdhs zovbsk il klalytpulk vu h jhzl-if–jhzl ihzpz, ahrpun puav jvuzpklyhapvu aol buklysfpun jvukpapvu aoha pz ilpun aylhalk, huk pukpcpkbhs whaplua mhjavyz zbjo hz aol sprlspovvk vm ylshwzl huk aol kbyhapvu vm jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua.

Nyhkbhs

dpaokyhdhs vm zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk il jvuzpklylk pu aovzl dovzl kpzlhzl pz busprlsf av ylshwzl huk ohcl: yljlpclk tvyl aohu 40 tn wylkupzvsvul (vy lxbpchslua) khpsf mvy tvyl aohu 1 dllr

vy

Zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf il zavwwlk hiybwasf pu aovzl dovzl kpzlhzl pz busprlsf av ylshwzl

Kbypun jvyapjvzalyvpk dpaokyhdhs aol kvzl thf il ylkbjlk yhwpksf kvdu av wofzpvsvnpjhs kvzlz (lxbpchslua av wylkupzvsvul 2–2.5 tn/t2 khpsf) huk aolu ylkbjlk tvyl zsvdsf. pz uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu.
